column2: Riley said you had some questions.
Faber, we're looking for a Stealth Device, like the one Leviathan used back in the day.

Ah, right! I remember following that. He was amazing. Anyway, as for the Stealth Device, I can make one for you.

You're not going to use it to get in any kind of trouble, are you?

OK, just making sure. The only thing is that I don't have all the necessary components to make it right now.

I'm going to need you two to get me XXXXX, XXXXXX, XXXXX, and XXXX. Do you think you can do that?
Sure. We're on it. Thanks, Faber!
